page.title: 19 RECENT EVENTS IN WEEDON BEC
page.content: Earlier this year the {Royal Military Depot} was used to film an advertisement for television.We did not know about it until we heard some very loud explosions and saw lots of bright lights.It advertised razors. Every year {the fair} comes to the playing field behind the village hall.We look forward to that because you get good rides. They are building some new houses in West Street and many people are cross because they cut down some nice trees. Each year the churches,the school and other groups have jumble sales,bazaars and barbecues to raise money.This year our school has raised a lot of money for {Dr Barnardos Homes}. Peter,a 16 year old in our village, won a 9000 pound car in a golf competition.He had to answer 50 questions on golf.
